name: Product Purchase on SauceDemo
description: Customers can browse products, add items to cart, and complete secure checkout

background.text: I am on the SauceDemo website at https://www.saucedemo.com

steps.text: I am on the SauceDemo login page
I enter 'standard_user' in the username field with data-testid 'username'
I enter 'secret_sauce' in the password field with data-testid 'password'
I click the login button with data-testid 'login-button'
I should be redirected to the inventory page
I should see the products container with data-testid 'inventory-container'

scenarios.name: Complete product purchase with single item

steps.text: I am logged in as 'standard_user'
I am on the inventory page
I click 'Add to cart' button for 'Sauce Labs Backpack'
I click the shopping cart icon with data-testid 'shopping-cart-link'
I click the checkout button with data-testid 'checkout'
I enter 'John' in first name field with data-testid 'firstName'
I enter 'Doe' in last name field with data-testid 'lastName'
I enter '12345' in postal code field with data-testid 'postalCode'
I click continue button with data-testid 'continue'
I click finish button with data-testid 'finish'
I should see order confirmation with text 'Thank you for your order!'
I should see completion message with data-testid 'complete-header'

scenarios.name: Add multiple products to cart and verify cart contents

steps.text: I am logged in and on the inventory page
I add 'Sauce Labs Backpack' to cart
I add 'Sauce Labs Bike Light' to cart
I add 'Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt' to cart
I click the shopping cart icon
I should see 3 items in the cart
the cart badge should display '3'
I should see all three product names in the cart list

scenarios.name: Remove item from cart and verify updated total

steps.text: I have added 2 items to my cart
I am viewing the cart page
I click remove button for 'Sauce Labs Backpack'
the item should be removed from cart
the cart badge should display '1'
the cart should contain only the remaining item

scenarios.name: View product details and return to inventory

steps.text: I am on the inventory page
I click on 'Sauce Labs Backpack' product name
I should see the product detail page
I should see product description and price details
I click the back button with data-testid 'back-to-products'
I should return to the inventory page

scenarios.name: Sort products by price low to high

steps.text: I am on the inventory page
I click the sort dropdown with data-testid 'product-sort-container'
I select 'Price (low to high)' option
products should be displayed in ascending price order
the first product should have the lowest price
I am on the login page
I enter 'invalid_user' in username field
I enter 'secret_sauce' in password field
I click the login button
I should see error message 'Username and password do not match'
I should remain on the login page
I am on the login page
I enter 'standard_user' in username field
I enter 'wrong_password' in password field
I click the login button
I should see error message 'Username and password do not match'
I should remain on the login page

scenarios.name: Checkout fails with missing required information

steps.text: I have items in cart and am on checkout information page
I enter <first_name> in first name field
I enter <last_name> in last name field
I enter <postal_code> in postal code field
I click continue button
I should see error message <error_message>
I should remain on the checkout information page
I am on the login page
I enter 'locked_out_user' in username field
I enter 'secret_sauce' in password field
I click the login button
I should see error message 'Sorry, this user has been locked out'
I should not be able to access the inventory page
I am logged in with an empty cart
I click the shopping cart icon
I should see an empty cart page
the checkout button should not be present or disabled
I click continue shopping
I should return to the inventory page

scenarios.name: Maximum items in cart boundary test

steps.text: I am on the inventory page
I add all 6 available products to cart
the cart badge should display '6'
all add to cart buttons should change to remove buttons
I view the cart
I should see all 6 items listed in the cart

scenarios.name: Navigate back from checkout without completing purchase

steps.text: I have items in cart and am on checkout overview page
I click cancel button
I should return to the inventory page
my cart items should still be preserved
I check the cart icon
the cart badge should still show my item count

gherkin_content:
Feature: Product Purchase on SauceDemo
  Customers can browse products, add items to cart, and complete secure checkout

  Background:
    Given I am on the SauceDemo website at https://www.saucedemo.com
    And the application is loaded successfully

  @smoke @positive @login
  Scenario: Successful login with valid credentials
    Given I am on the SauceDemo login page
    When I enter 'standard_user' in the username field with data-testid 'username'
    And I enter 'secret_sauce' in the password field with data-testid 'password'
    And I click the login button with data-testid 'login-button'
    Then I should be redirected to the inventory page
    And I should see the products container with data-testid 'inventory-container'

  @smoke @positive @e2e
  Scenario: Complete product purchase with single item
    Given I am logged in as 'standard_user'
    And I am on the inventory page
    When I click 'Add to cart' button for 'Sauce Labs Backpack'
    And I click the shopping cart icon with data-testid 'shopping-cart-link'
    And I click the checkout button with data-testid 'checkout'
    And I enter 'John' in first name field with data-testid 'firstName'
    And I enter 'Doe' in last name field with data-testid 'lastName'
    And I enter '12345' in postal code field with data-testid 'postalCode'
    And I click continue button with data-testid 'continue'
    And I click finish button with data-testid 'finish'
    Then I should see order confirmation with text 'Thank you for your order!'
    And I should see completion message with data-testid 'complete-header'

  @positive @cart
  Scenario: Add multiple products to cart and verify cart contents
    Given I am logged in and on the inventory page
    When I add 'Sauce Labs Backpack' to cart
    And I add 'Sauce Labs Bike Light' to cart
    And I add 'Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt' to cart
    And I click the shopping cart icon
    Then I should see 3 items in the cart
    And the cart badge should display '3'
    And I should see all three product names in the cart list

  @positive @cart
  Scenario: Remove item from cart and verify updated total
    Given I have added 2 items to my cart
    And I am viewing the cart page
    When I click remove button for 'Sauce Labs Backpack'
    Then the item should be removed from cart
    And the cart badge should display '1'
    And the cart should contain only the remaining item

  @positive @navigation
  Scenario: View product details and return to inventory
    Given I am on the inventory page
    When I click on 'Sauce Labs Backpack' product name
    Then I should see the product detail page
    And I should see product description and price details
    When I click the back button with data-testid 'back-to-products'
    Then I should return to the inventory page

  @positive @sorting
  Scenario: Sort products by price low to high
    Given I am on the inventory page
    When I click the sort dropdown with data-testid 'product-sort-container'
    And I select 'Price (low to high)' option
    Then products should be displayed in ascending price order
    And the first product should have the lowest price

  @negative @login
  Scenario: Login fails with invalid username
    Given I am on the login page
    When I enter 'invalid_user' in username field
    And I enter 'secret_sauce' in password field
    And I click the login button
    Then I should see error message 'Username and password do not match'
    And I should remain on the login page

  @negative @login
  Scenario: Login fails with invalid password
    Given I am on the login page
    When I enter 'standard_user' in username field
    And I enter 'wrong_password' in password field
    And I click the login button
    Then I should see error message 'Username and password do not match'
    And I should remain on the login page

  @negative @checkout
  Scenario: Checkout fails with missing required information
    Given I have items in cart and am on checkout information page
    When I enter <first_name> in first name field
    And I enter <last_name> in last name field
    And I enter <postal_code> in postal code field
    And I click continue button
    Then I should see error message <error_message>
    And I should remain on the checkout information page

  @negative @access
  Scenario: Locked user cannot login
    Given I am on the login page
    When I enter 'locked_out_user' in username field
    And I enter 'secret_sauce' in password field
    And I click the login button
    Then I should see error message 'Sorry, this user has been locked out'
    And I should not be able to access the inventory page

  @edge-case @cart
  Scenario: Empty cart checkout attempt
    Given I am logged in with an empty cart
    When I click the shopping cart icon
    Then I should see an empty cart page
    And the checkout button should not be present or disabled
    When I click continue shopping
    Then I should return to the inventory page

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Maximum items in cart boundary test
    Given I am on the inventory page
    When I add all 6 available products to cart
    Then the cart badge should display '6'
    And all add to cart buttons should change to remove buttons
    When I view the cart
    Then I should see all 6 items listed in the cart

  @alternative-flow @navigation
  Scenario: Navigate back from checkout without completing purchase
    Given I have items in cart and am on checkout overview page
    When I click cancel button
    Then I should return to the inventory page
    And my cart items should still be preserved
    When I check the cart icon
    Then the cart badge should still show my item count
